NAME: Giri Giridhar
ABOUT:
Over the years, I have built a broadbased career - across multiple businesses - consumer businesses, financial services, retail and pharma  - and across multiple geographies -  Asia and Europe. Have lived and worked in India, Dubai, Singapore and London.

Love to build high performance teams. In 2015-16, program managed a Global Finance Director Acceleration Program at MSD for 23 of our High Potential Finance talent around the world.

Significant experience in business and financial transformation. At Wockhardt, such transformation efforts led to a very visible 18x jump in share price.

Have won several awards including Most Influential CFOs of India award from CIMA in 2015 & 2016; CFO for the Year for Excellence in Finance in Managing a Turnaround in the Ninth Annual CFO Awards given out by IMA (2013). 

Member of a unique CFO Board - which consists of the senior most CFOs in the country (TCS, L&T, SBI, GE, Pepsico et al), acting as a thinktank for providing non-partisan points of view on key policy issues to the Government, the Ministry of Finance in particular

Angel Investor.

Deeply passionate about Authentic Leadership and committed to Doing Well by Doing Good.

Specialties: Finance, Transformations, M&A, Strategy, Governance & Compliance
